document.full_text: work to prepare nasa's new mars rover for launch has been temporarily halted to allow safety reviews after a crane operations accident at the kennedy space center, officials said on tuesday.
document.title: crane mishap halts nasa's mars probe launch prep
lines_and_colors: work to prepare nasa's new mars rover for launch has been temporarily halted to allow safety reviews after a crane operations accident at the kennedy space center, officials said on tuesday.
